name: CinemaPets
0:
”Alexa, ask cinema pets if animals die in Fight Club”
”Alexa, ask cinema pets if the dog dies in Old Yeller”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cinema pets
des: Currently, Cinema Pets is used to find out if animals or pets die in a particular movie. Great if you want to avoid watching a movie to watch a furry little friend meet an untimely end. No spoilers are revealed, and more features are coming soon!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
